original_title: 映画の女の子、の依拠する三角関係に差し当たって
overview: Hori plays the three roles of a girl who watches a movie, a girl who takes a movie, and a girl who plays a role in a movie, depicting a story of three people related to movies. Director Yamato has been depicting the delicate emotions of girls. This film is a perfect example of her worldview.
title: A Girl in a Movie, In the Midst of a Relying Triangle
